newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico stocks surge in late trade on Wall St gains.
newsitem.headline: Mexico stocks surge in late trade on Wall St gains.

text.p: Mexican stocks extended early gains to be sharply higher in late trade on Thursday, tracking gains on Wall Street which lured some foreign investors back to the market, traders said.
"Things here improved when Wall Street rebounded, and buyers stepped in once the Dow gained more than 70 points," a floor trader said. "Now every one is buying paper, locals and foreigners."
The leading IPC share index was up 44.50 points, or 1.18 percent, at 3,818.52.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average had meanwhile soared 97.53 points to 7183.18.
